channel.title: Instructional Videos, Presentations, and Blogs on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Instructional Videos, Presentations, and Blogs on OSCAL

item.title: 3rd OSCAL Workshop
item.description: When March 1, 2022 thru March 2nd, 2022 Purpose The workshop will provide attendees an opportunity to familiarize themselves and build skills in the development and use of OSCAL. We encourage developers of control-oriented security tools, and organizations that want to use or create OSCAL-based information, to register and attend the workshop. The following presentations are available from this workshop. Recordings are also provided where available. The full agenda is also available.

item.title: 2nd OSCAL Workshop
item.description: When February 2, 2021 thru February 3, 2021 Purpose The workshop will provide attendees an opportunity to familiarize themselves and build skills in the development and use of OSCAL. We encourage developers of control-oriented security tools, and organizations that want to use or create OSCAL-based information, to register and attend the workshop. The following presentations are available from this workshop. Recordings are also provided where available. The full agenda is also available.
